Emily you've for sure gained another sub from me and we definitely want to see you make YouTube videos! Don't be scared to do it, you are awesome!!

You are probably the first american i heard beeing conscious about the word „niche“. Even though you then went on pronouncing it a very american way^^ nothing wrong about that, but the other way you prounounced it was actully far closer to the origin of the word in the french language. Well, i have no idea why i am writing that here, i usually dont tend to correct people, at least not on the internet^^ love your show and apreciate a lot how you open space for a broader the public. Keep up the great work
